title: fix(player): Don't unpause on share and save

issue.title: Screenshot wrong frame
issue.body:
### Steps to reproduce

1. Pause the video
2. Open screenshot panel
3. Click on "Save"

### Expected behavior

Screenshot should be of the frame I paused on

### Actual behavior

Video unpauses and wrong frame is screenshoted

### Crash logs

_No response_

### Aniyomi version

v0.16.4.3-r8037

### Android version

12

### Device

Samsung Galaxy M31

### Other details

_No response_
